oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grave of Osceola
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A photograph of the grave of Osceola, Seminole Indian chief, on Sullivan's Island, South Carolina. A fence surrounds the headstone of the grave. In the background is a mound of land with a fence and palm tree. Poem on reverse, "At the Grave of Osceola. Chief of the Seminoles, Sullivan's Island, S.C."
American Indian leader during the Second Seminole War.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Osceola, Seminole chief, 1804-1838
